description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Kill the zombies before they enter the building and eat your brains! Enabled by the Torque X 3D Engine Zombie Sniper 3D provides unparalleled graphics rendering and appearance, with advanced shading and dynamic lighting effects. Zombie Sniper 3D has a unique 4 track music mix that keeps the heart pumping. Zombie Sniper 3D also includes medals that can be earned during game play.
